=Example usage=
[[/engineImportTXD.md|engineImportTXD]] can be used to replace CJ clothing texture components like this:
<code>
txd = engineLoadTXD("myafro.txd")
engineImportTXD( txd, 30201 )
</syntaxhighlight>

Names can be used instead of IDs, and this does exactly the same thing as above:
<code>
txd = engineLoadTXD("myafro.txd")
engineImportTXD( txd, "afro" )
</syntaxhighlight>

=Original textures=
Get the original textures from the GTA file '''models\player.img'''

=ID List=
Full list of clothing texture component IDs and names:<br/>
(The texture names are also the same as those listed in the [[/CJ_Clothes.md|clothes catalog]])
